title: Auto Lock-In Champion?

replies.body:
That's a terrible idea.

You should be flexible enough that you can choose another champion in the event that the opposing team picks someone that counters your champion, or in the event that your team choose champions that don't sit well with who you want to play.
Dude, bad idea, they removed automatically locking in picks for a reason.

No, you should NOT be able to "auto lock-in". You know, they removed this feature for a reason. Mainly to stop those damn AFK's who did not participate in the champion select process. Also, you should probably increase your champion pool.

Just imagine the Rivens.....

I dont think I've ever seen a Riven NOT instalock..

personally i don't even know why there is a 'lock-in' button _(especially in blind pick)_ it causes far more harm than good.
